condition: !(IsFirstAVPSessionId()) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIRST_AVP_SESSIONID")) != "NaN" &&(LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Deny incoming messages if the first AVP is not Session-ID

condition: IsExist(#AVP296[1]) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIREWALL_MAP_SINGLE_AVP296")) != "NaN" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Single occurrence of Origin-Realm validation of incoming messages

condition: IsExist(#AVP264[1]) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIREWALL_MAP_SINGLE_AVP264")) != "NaN" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy"  && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Single occurrence of Origin-Host validation of incoming messages

condition: IsExist(#AVP283[1]) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIREWALL_MAP_SINGLE_AVP283")) != "NaN" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy"  && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Single occurrence of Destination-Realm validation of incoming messages

condition: IsExist(#AVP260[1]) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIREWALL_MAP_SINGLE_AVP260")) != "NaN" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy"   && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Single occurrence of Vendor-specific-application-id validation of incoming messages

condition: IsExist(#AVP1407V10415[1]) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIREWALL_MAP_SINGLE_AVP1407")) != "NaN" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Single occurrence of Visited-PLMN-id validation of incoming messages

condition: NotInList2D(NumberToString(GetHeaderAppId()),NumberToString(GetCmdCode()), "DUALEXACTLIST_CMD_CODE") && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP283, "MAP_FIREWALL_MAP_CMD_CODE")) != "NaN" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue ("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue ("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Command-Code and Application ID validation of incoming messages

condition: (RESULT := PrefixMap(SOURCE_REALM, "MAP_FIREWALL_SRC_ORIGIN_REALM")) != "NaN" && NotInList2D(SOURCE_REALM, AVP296, "DUALPREFIXLIST_SRC_ORIGIN_REALM_WL")&& (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"

(GetCmdCode() == 317 || GetCmdCode() == 319 || GetCmdCode() == 320 || GetCmdCode() == 322) && (RESULT := (TwoDMap(AVP283, AVP1, "DUALPREFIXMAP_FIREWALL_MAP_INBOUND_HOME_IMSI_BL"))) != "NaN" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Inbound Roamer HOME IMSI Blacklist filter

condition: (GetCmdCode() == 317 || GetCmdCode() == 319 || GetCmdCode() == 320 || GetCmdCode() == 322) && (RESULT := PrefixMap(AVP296, "MAP_FIREWALL_OUTBOUND_HOME_IMSI")) != "NaN" && NotInList2D(AVP296, AVP1, "DUALPREFIXLIST_OUTBOUND_HOME_IMSI_WL")&& (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
Filter Name: Deny outgoing request messages from customer's HSS sending to MME if IMSI prefix of the message does not belong to customer

condition: (RESULT := PlainMap(AVP296, "PLAINMAP_FIREWALL_MAP_ORIGIN_REALM_HOST")) != "NaN" && NotInList2D(AVP296, AVP294, "DUALEXACTLIST_ORIGIN_REALM_HOST_WL")&& (RESULT_CODE := GetJSONValue("RESULT_CODE", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && (LOG_FIREWALL_TDR := GetJSONValue("WILL_LOG", RESULT)) != "Dummy" && RESULT_CODE != "0"
